## R Ecdf compared to normaldistribution figur
```{r}
plot(ecdf(rock$area), main = "ecdf compared to normal distribution")
curve(pnorm(x, mean(rock$area), sd(rock$area)), 
      from = 0, to = 12000, add = TRUE, col='blue', lwd = 2)
```
```{r}
#Ecdf regne-eksempel figur 
x<- c(10,10,12,13,15)
plot(ecdf(x), main= "Hejsa")
```
